Vps_ScCoeffParams Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » VPS - Common API » VPS - Scaler Config API

Application interface structure for programming the coefficients. Structure will be used for all drivers involving scalers. More...

#include <vps_cfgSc.h>

Data Fields

UInt32 scalerId
 
UInt32 hScalingSet
 
UInt32 vScalingSet
 

Detailed Description

Application interface structure for programming the coefficients. Structure will be used for all drivers involving scalers.

struct Vps_ScCoeffParams

Field Documentation

UInt32 Vps_ScCoeffParams::hScalingSet

Horizontal scaling coefficient set. For valid values see Vps_ScCoeffSet.

UInt32 Vps_ScCoeffParams::scalerId

Scaler ID - Used in case multiple scalers are present in a driver.

UInt32 Vps_ScCoeffParams::vScalingSet

Vertical scaling coefficeint set. For valid values see Vps_ScCoeffSet.
